title: Statutory Deadlines Configuration
description: Configure and manage statutory time limits for legal proceedings and compliance
overview: The Statutory Deadlines module is critical for compliance management. Configure event types with their statutory time limits, and the system automatically calculates deadlines based on case events. Missing statutory deadlines can result in case dismissal or waiver of rights, making this configuration essential.
